song_lyrics: Shrījī maḷyāno umang, ho jī re, lāgyo satsangno rang...
Saddharma sthāpyo chhe ang... lāgyo satsangno rang 1
Gnān taṇī relāvī Gang... lāgyo satsangno rang 2
Prabhu shu prīt joḍī vishay chhoḍāvī,
Vairāgī bhasma choḷī ang... lāgyo satsangno rang 3
Bhaktinā pūryā navrang... lāgyo satsangno rang 4
title: Aksharnā ange Pramukh Swāmīnā sange

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-3025: Sadhu Gnaneshwardas

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
